content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --LOBXFL
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: Y
    - name: --LOBXFL
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000170
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --LOBXFL is not 'Y' or null
Outcome:
  Message: Value of --LOBXFL must be 'Y' or null
  Output Variables:
    - --CAT
    - --TEST
    - --TESTCD
    - --LOBXFL
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0541
              Version: '1.0'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The value should be "Y" or null.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: Various Findings Domains
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --LOBXFL is not 'Y' or null

Outcome.Message: Value of --LOBXFL must be 'Y' or null

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The value should be "Y" or null.
